response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to me, reflecting its significance and the investment I've made in it. I am now extending this chance to you at a special offer price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its intrinsic value, providing you with a remarkable acquisition at an attractive cost. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both of us to benefit from this exceptional product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
